scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.lint: ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo '✔  Your .js files look so good.' && ./node_modules/htmlhint/bin/htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/*.ejs && ./node_modules/htmlhint/bin/htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/*.ejs && ./node_modules/htmlhint/bin/htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/*.ejs && ./node_modules/htmlhint/bin/htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/*.ejs && ./node_modules/htmlhint/bin/htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/**/*.ejs && ./node_modules/htmlhint/bin/htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/**/**/*.ejs && ./node_modules/htmlhint/bin/htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/**/**/**/*.ejs && echo '✔  So do your .ejs files.' && ./node_modules/lesshint/bin/lesshint assets/styles/ --max-warnings=0 && echo '✔  Your .less files look good, too.'
scripts.custom-tests: echo "(No other custom tests yet.)" && echo
